question: My sis in law is 9 weeks pregnant and she has been diagnosed with diabetes..her blood glucose is way upto 300 mg/dl but sumtyms falling low.her hba1c is 10.9..she is takn insulin injections.we hv read dat der can can be a chance for d baby 2 hv defects or anomalies.Can it be true?any1 wid similar experiences?
title: diabetes in pregnancy and outcome
